description: Starts an asynchronous invocation. This operation requires permission for the bedrock:InvokeModel action.

parameters.name: clientRequestToken
parameters.description: Specify idempotency token to ensure that requests are not duplicated. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: modelInput
parameters.description: Input to send to the model.

parameters.name: outputDataConfig
parameters.description: Where to store the output. s3OutputDataConfig (dict) --- A storage location for the output data in an S3 bucket An object URI starting with s3://. kmsKeyId (string) --- A KMS encryption key ID. bucketOwner (string) --- If the bucket belongs to another AWS account, specify that account's ID.

nested_params.name: s3OutputDataConfig
nested_params.description: A storage location for the output data in an S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: s3Uri
nested_params.description: An object URI starting with s3://.

nested_params.name: bucketOwner
nested_params.description: If the bucket belongs to another AWS account, specify that account's ID.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags to apply to the invocation. (dict) --- A tag. The tag's key. The tag's value.
